text: Hello guys I have been implementing the HubSpot chat on our company website and I would like to set up in our company’s mobile app. I requested access 2 weeks ago but I haven’t heard back yet. Can someone here help me get access?

Hi <@U07MJH1HEG7>! I can confirm that your request was submitted successfully so we have your info. Let me check in with <@U06GS7BG27J> (who is currently attending INBOUND) and see if we can move this along.
<@U07ARLLF39N> thank you! Let me know if you guys need any additional info. I would also like if we can get it set up in our sandbox HubSpot so I can test.
